= Who am I ? =

My name is Gerd Volberg. My short [Vita] is: 15 years Oracle Forms, Oracle Designer and PL/SQL, 10 years of presentations at doag-conferences, 3 years of Oracle Open Worlds in San Francisco, and more

[News Framework News]

= Forms Framework =
My lifetime-project called [FormsFramework Forms Framework] is a bundle of Reference-Templates, PL/SQL-Libraries, Forms Templates and How-To's for an easier development of Oracle Forms-Projects

= Conferences =
All my [PresentationsSince1997 presentations] since 1997.
